HostMyThing.com ★ 20% off for LIFE all VPS Packages! ★ 1 GB RAM & 90 GB HDD @ $23.96!

I am pleased to offer yet again another great deal from HostMyThing.com! We are willing to offer potential new clients 20 % off for life on their new HostMyThing VPS.
Use the promo code: 0MX2RJU7AD

Our VPS nodes are located in a brand new Buffalo, New York datacenter built in 2009 by ColoCrossing. ColoCrossing is a well-established company operating since 2003 that has been dedicated to providing quality dedicated & colocation services. We are proud to say that we locate our servers in their facilities and that we look forward to many great years to come with them. In addition, we use Virtualizor as a VPS control panel. Virtualizor is a complete VPS Control Panel Management solution. This fully feature-packed control panel allows you to control every aspect of your virtual server and view it’s statistics. You can remotely boot, reboot, change hostname, shutdown, access SSH root access, and much more. Upon signup, you will be sent a welcome email with your very own login information to Virtualizor. It’s so lightweight and easy to use that anyone could use it!

So, with so many choices, why host with us?
HostMyThing.com is your premier web hosting company, everything from simple web hosting to Enterprise level Dedicated solutions. We guarantee our services will be reliable, and there when you need it. We back all of our hosting with a 30 day money-back guarantee. What sets HostMyThing apart from other hosts is our service – that’s the HMT Difference. We always put our clients first, no matter what the case. Our company is made up of a talented team of individuals who all love what they do, with years of experience under their belts. HostMyThing is unlike any other hosting provider out there. Period. Try the HMT difference, and see how we can work for you!


All VPS plans come with:
  • Virtualizor VPS Control Panel

  • Intel E3-1240 Quad Core Servers
  • No-Overselling Guarantee
